attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: Life just hasnt been the same since the POP MAN upped and left town, for a start you dont get your 15p back on plastic coke bottles. So we the undersigned ask you to bring this man, this God back to the forefront of the juice delivering world. BRING BACK THE POP MAN!!!

reasons: Outside the remit of the Prime Minister and Government
